body_html:
Yeah, working on rewriting these bash scripts in python to make the code more organized/readable. Anything you add to the current .sh scripts will probably be deleted (or reimplemented in Python).

Not much you can currently do to help except by changing the current build shell scripts as little as possible.

body:
Yeah, working on rewriting these bash scripts in python to make the code more organized/readable.  Anything you add to the current .sh scripts will probably be deleted (or reimplemented in Python). 

Not much you can currently do to help except by changing the current build shell scripts as little as possible.
